265530.name: Axis Game Factory Demo
265530.description:
Axis Game Factory’s AGFPRO 1.0 – for PC, MAC and LINUX


AGFPRO 1.0 is a comprehensive tool-set designed to provide game developers and enthusiasts with a powerful and rapid level creation, terrain/vegetation editing, lighting and atmosphere system.

AGF is an independent product that empowers users to create game levels and environments for all types of game genres, and the AGFPRO 1.0 PREMIUM version is also designed to work in concert with the Free and Pro versions of the Unity 4 game engine to allow further customization and game publishing. AGF runs on the PC, MAC and LINUX systems.

AGFPRO 1.0 FREE/DEMO includes all key features provided in AGFPRO 1.0 and AGFPRO 1.0 PREMIUM, without the ability to save scene files or access the Unity Free and Pro features (see table below). It is a great way to rapidly level create and design your own games without having to pay for the added features. When you are ready to start saving and sharing your games or want to go "Full Pro" and publish them using Unity - you can step up to the other two versions.


AGF empowers developers to rapidly create game maps, sculpt terrain and design levels quickly and easily. With over 500 assets pre-stocked in the warehouse, along with 28 pre-set themes and 8 sample maps, developers and enthusiasts can begin creating levels in minutes. AGFPRO 1.0 PREMIUM includes all of the necessary plug-ins, scripts and shaders to allow users the ability to import AGF scenes into Unity4.

KEY FEATURES:


• User-Friendly Project Creation Wizard
o Extensive library of pre-set themes for immediate level design
o Themes include lighting, atmosphere, terrain, vegetation, & water pre-defined

• Intuitive User Interface with "Radial Menu" to expedite workflow
o Drag and reorganize windows to customize UI
o On & Off feature quickly hide menus

• Advanced Terrain Creation System
o Adjustable: terrain size, splat map & vegetation detail resolution
o Supports terrains from 100ms to 2,000ms

• Paint, Sculpt and Plant vegetation individually or simultaneously
o Toggle: terrain visibility, painting, sculpting, planting

• Sophisticated Brush Support
o Extensive brush library with adjustable brush size, rotation, power, blend

• Real Time Terrain Deformation and Painting System with Tri-Planar Texturing with Normal Maps
o Toggle between tri-planar shader & simple
o Intuitive Terrain "Snap to Grid Height" to set terrain
o Numeric input and readout of terrain height at specific locations

• Tri-Planar Shaders and Texturing
o Shader automatically maps terrain inclines with user defined texture
o Over 40 textures included with Normal Maps

• Terrain Texture Color Tinting Feature
o Change individual textures or batch
o Change terrain textures quickly and update in real-time

• Advanced Vegetation System
o Adjustable vegetation density & distance, unlimited layers
o Set vegetation min. width, height & color spectrum

• Advanced Global Vegetation Editor
o Globally change vegetation color saturation, value, size, minimum width & height, color spectrums

• Fully featured lighting and atmosphere configuration allows quick real time and runtime customization

• Customized Lighting System
o Key, Fill, Back, and Ambient light sources
o Set light colors, flares & shadow configurations

• Fog System
o Global and simple fog with a variety of parameters: density, falloff, color and distance
o Set fog haze, density, distance, color, height and falloff

• Skyboxes – Select skybox cube maps with the ability to apply rotation & tint

• Beautiful water system with sliders for wave direction, speed, intensity, refraction/reflection color and foam properties

• Geometry Brush System
o Create unlimited sets of geometry brushes
o Brushes function as an independent layer to edit
o Set min/max scale range
o Randomly rotate X, Y, Z coordinates
o Align to Normal
o Spray geometry from camera view direction

• User-friendly file saving thumbnail generation for scenes when saved

• Extensive Presets to quickly start scenes (28 included)
o Create custom presets and share with friends

• Independent Pre-Fab Mode to create complex collections of assets outside of your scene

• Fully featured transformation tools include:
o Select, Multiple-Select, Copy/Paste, Duplicate, Translate, Rotate & Scale

• Intuitive Grid-Snapping and Collision Detection easily place objects in scene

• Two internal players and three external players included
o Action-Role Playing Player (Int. & Ext.)
o Platformer Player (Int. & Ext.)
o FPS Player (Ext.)

AGFPRO 1.0 PREMIUM
• Unity Free and Pro plugins
